name: Veltex Machinery
overview:
Established in the year 2011, we, “Veltex Machinery”, are one of the distinguished organizations that are engaged in manufacturing and supplying a broad gamut of superior-grade Textile Wrapping Machine, Heavy Beamer, Hydraulic Trolleys and Various Types of Creel.

Our Products: This range of products includes High Speed Sectional Warping Machine, Heavy Beamer (JP-804), Sectional Warping machine, Disc Brake System and Revolving Cone Creel.

Our Team: A team of distinguished professionals is a main reason behind the success of our organization. Our team of highly efficient professionals aids us in manufacturing and supplying a wide range of superior quality Textile Wrapping Machine, Heavy Beamer, Hydraulic Trolleys and Various Types of Creel.

Infrastructure: For performing all business operations with ease, we have constructed a modernized infrastructure facility at Ahmedabad (Gujarat, India).

Quality Assurance: Combining outstanding value and quality, our organization is manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive array of finest grade Textile Wrapping Machine, Heavy Beamer, Hydraulic Trolleys and Various Types of Creel.
